edited_stories.edited_story_text: I visited the local park yesterday. First I ate at a local restaurant and ate a meal. Then I started looking for interesting things as I hiked. The view from the top of the mountain was beautiful. I brought my camera to take a picture of the great view.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: I went to the local park yesterday. We took a lot of good pictures of the sceneries.  We ate at a restaurant at a golf course.  It was a nice sunny day. It was warm so I wore shorts.
